ViewObject.Name: MnjWarrantyManagementLineVOEx
ViewObject.SQLQuery: SELECT MnjWarrantyManagementLineEO.LINE_ID, MnjWarrantyManagementLineEO.HEADER_ID, MnjWarrantyManagementLineEO.ORGANIZATION, MnjWarrantyManagementLineEO.ORG_ID, MnjWarrantyManagementLineEO.DEPARTMENT, MnjWarrantyManagementLineEO.ITEM_NAME, MnjWarrantyManagementLineEO.ITEM_CODE, MnjWarrantyManagementLineEO.ITEM_DESCRIPTION, MnjWarrantyManagementLineEO.QTY, MnjWarrantyManagementLineEO.VERSION_NO, MnjWarrantyManagementLineEO.VERSION_DATE, MnjWarrantyManagementLineEO.RESP_ID, MnjWarrantyManagementLineEO.USER_ID, MnjWarrantyManagementLineEO.CREATION_DATE, MnjWarrantyManagementLineEO.CREATED_BY, MnjWarrantyManagementLineEO.LAST_UPDATE_DATE, MnjWarrantyManagementLineEO.LAST_UPDATED_BY, MnjWarrantyManagementLineEO.WARRANTY_START_DATE, MnjWarrantyManagementLineEO.WARRANTY_END_DATE, MnjWarrantyManagementLineEO.WARRANTY_CARD, MnjWarrantyManagementLineEO.INVOICE, MnjWarrantyManagementLineEO.PURCHASE_DATE, MnjWarrantyManagementLineEO.PURCHASE_PRICE, MnjWarrantyManagementLineEO.SUPPLIER_NAME, MnjWarrantyManagementLineEO.TOTAL_AMOUNT, MnjWarrantyManagementLineEO.BRAND_NAME, MnjWarrantyManagementLineEO.WARRANTY_MONTHS, MnjWarrantyManagementLineEO.PREFIX_ITEM, MnjWarrantyManagementLineEO.FIXED_ASSET_TAG_ID, MnjWarrantyManagementLineEO.GRN, MnjWarrantyManagementLineEO.PR, MnjWarrantyManagementLineEO.SPO, MnjWarrantyManagementLineEO.ITEM_ID, MnjWarrantyManagementLineEO.PRODUCT_SERIAL_NO, MnjWarrantyManagementLineEO.PRODUCT_ID, MnjWarrantyManagementLineEO.GRN_DATE, MnjWarrantyManagementLineEO.WARRANTY_ID, MnjWarrantyManagementLineEO.UNIT, MnjWarrantyManagementLineEO.BILL_NO, MnjWarrantyManagementLineEO.UOM, MnjWarrantyManagementLineEO.BILL_DATE, MnjWarrantyManagementLineEO.PRODUCT_USER, MnjWarrantyManagementLineEO.WARRANTY_REMAINING_DAYS, MnjWarrantyManagementLineEO.REPLACEMENT_DATE, MnjWarrantyManagementLineEO.LOCATION, MnjWarrantyManagementLineEO.VENDOR_ID, MnjWarrantyManagementLineEO.PO_LINE_ID, MnjWarrantyManagementLineEO.WARRANTY_TAG, MnjWarrantyManagementLineEO.PO_HEADER_ID, MnjWarrantyManagementLineEO.ITEM_CATEGORY, MnjWarrantyManagementLineEO.ITEM_SUB_CATEGORY, MnjWarrantyManagementLineEO.ITEM_CATEGORY_SHORT, MnjWarrantyManagementLineEO.ITEM_CATEGORY_ID, MnjWarrantyManagementLineEO.ITEM_SUB_CATEGORY_ID, MnjWarrantyManagementLineEO.ITEM_SUB_CATEGORY_SHORT, MnjWarrantyManagementLineEO.SUB_LOCATION, MnjWarrantyManagementLineEO.WARRANTY_TYPE, MnjWarrantyManagementLineEO.WARRANTY_ITEM_SERIAL_NUMBER, MnjWarrantyManagementLineEO.REMARKS, MnjWarrantyManagementLineEO.PRODUCT_USER_EMP_ID, MnjWarrantyManagementLineEO.PRODUCT_USER_DEPT, MnjWarrantyManagementLineEO.COST_CENTER, MnjWarrantyManagementLineEO.COST_CENTER_NAME, MnjWarrantyManagementLineEO.SCHEDULE_MAINTAIN_FLAG, MnjWarrantyManagementLineEO.MAINTAIN_PERIOD, MnjWarrantyManagementLineEO.LAST_MAINTAIN_DATE, MnjWarrantyManagementLineEO.NEXT_MAINTAIN_DATE, ROUND ( (MnjWarrantyManagementLineEO.NEXT_MAINTAIN_DATE - SYSDATE)) Rem_Days_For_Next_Main, ROUND ( (MnjWarrantyManagementLineEO.WARRANTY_END_DATE - SYSDATE)) Remaining_Warranty_Days, MnjWarrantyManagementLineEO.WARRANTY_START_DATE Maintenance_Start_From FROM MNJ_WARRANTY_MANAGEMENT_LINE MnjWarrantyManagementLineEO where 1=1 /** Added P_Resp_Id by Sakibul Islam on 02.09.2020 **/ and (((:P_Resp_Id = '50821') and MnjWarrantyManagementLineEO.ORG_ID = 342) --50821 --> GFL or ((:P_Resp_Id = '50822') and MnjWarrantyManagementLineEO.ORG_ID = 344) --50822 --> GWL or ((:P_Resp_Id = '20634') and MnjWarrantyManagementLineEO.ORG_ID in (340,341,342,343,344,526,527))) --20634 --> Corporate Office ORDER BY MnjWarrantyManagementLineEO.LINE_ID DESC
